parameters.name: completed
parameters.description: If nil, all incidents are returned. If true only completed incidents. If false only incomplete incidents

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: Incidents only by a specific user

parameters.name: reactions
parameters.description: Comma delimited list of reactions to match with ANY search

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Comma delimited list of tags to match with ANY search

parameters.name: ratings
parameters.description: Comma delimited list of ratings to match with ANY search

parameters.name: incident_type_id
parameters.description: Any Incidents matching the incident type

parameters.name: place_id
parameters.description: Any Incidents matching the place or place's descendents. Searching for California place, matches SF places
